unnormalised: Konknnint Civil Kaydea vixim konnem mhaka vicharlem, ani sotachench sangchem zalear, to ek vhodd vishay asa! Mullant, tem vyaktim'modim vo sonstham'modim zatolea zhogddeanchem nirakaran karta, zantunt sadharonnpannem zail-chimtteak bodlek nuksaan bhorpai vo khasgi karyavahichem asa. Sompoti viximchea zhogddeacho vichar kora, zoxe tumcho xezari tumchea zominichea bhagacher bhandkam korta (Survey No. 123/4, udharonnakhatir). Vo kararantlea motbhed, zoxe konnem tumkam Rs. 50,000 dievop na tem tumi taka Mar'23-ant viklel'lea junnea baikikhatir. Divorce-chim mukadme ani dayajiche vixayui Civil Kaydeant yetat, zoxe konnachim melear vorsa uprant dayajichi vanttnni zavop (Succession Act, 1956 pormannem).

Criminal kaydeak veglempannen, zo State vs. konn, civil mukadme sadharonnpannen vyakti A vs. vyakti B astat. Tumkam "Plaintiff" ani "Defendant" sarkhe utranchem laginponn courtachea kagdopatrancher distolem. Hi prakria sadharonnpannen courtant ek suit bhortat ten'na suru zata (zoxe, District Court sompotichi zhogddeakhatir, Family Court divorce-akhatir). Uprant purav divop, gavanchi gavai divop, ani nimannem, judge-an nirnnoy divop yeta. Legal fees chodd vegllea torechim astat, Adv. Sharma-n mhaka fokot ek sadhi notice toyar korpak ₹15,000 sangllem!
normalised: Konkai hukumache vixayant konnem mhaka vicharlem, ani sachi sangta, tem ek khub vistaril'lem vishay! Mullavem mhonnllear, tem vekti vo sanstha bhitorlean zhogddeam sovem sambondh dovorta, zatunt sadharanponni dhyey mhonnllear bondval vo khas kriyechi axa asta jail time bodlek. Astechea zhogddeam sovem vichar kor, zor tumcho bhazarekar tumchea zomnint divall bandta (Survey Number ek xembis ani teis slash char, udharonnacher). Vo kararachim asahmati, zor konnem tumkam agrimem rupya pon'nas hozar dilem na tem purannem bike tumi march don hozar ani teis-an viklem. Divorce cases ani virasatacheo vasto civil hukumachea khal yetat, asti vibhagni karpa voir viraskam bhitorlean konnachi mrityu zalyar (Succession Act promannem, ek hozar nounshav ani pon'nas so).

unnormalised: Eka boro vakil (B.A. LL.B unnim zai asa) mellyop zaroori, tumche Civil Kaydea vixim prosn aslear. Te tumka tumchea hakkam vixim ani bori karya vahinichi margdorxon kortele. Courtache mukadme vorsam porian choltolim – kaim sompoti chim mukadme 10+ vorsam porian choltolim! Mhunn, xoky aslear amistten tharavopacho yotn kara. Mhojea aja-n sodanch sangllem, "Tharavikpanan, ek vaittui tharav ek lamb zhogddeak von boro."
normalised: Criminal hukumacho viparit, zantunt State versus koni asta, civil cases sadharanponni person A versus person B astam. Tumkam sador korpachem "Plaintiff" ani "Defendant" hukumache kagdokapatrant uzar zatelim distalim. Pravruti sadharanponni ek dava poddta agrimachea court-an (zoxem, District Court astechea zhogddeam khatir, Family Court divorce-am khatir). Magir yetolem puraveachem pradhorxon, saxichim gavai, ani nimannem, judge-achem nirnnoi. Legal fees vistarit zatelim, Advocate Sharma-n mhaka rupya pandhra hozar mhonnlem sirf ek sadhem notice draft korchea khatir ekuch khepe.

Tem khub mhotvachem ek borea lawyer-ak vicharpachem (B-A L-L-B unnimuch garaz) zor tumi ek civil hukumacho prosn sangtat. Te tumchea hakkamcher ani boreantlea margacher tumkam bud'dhi divpak xakta. Court cases vorsam khatir vochpak xaktam – kiteak asticheo cases dha vorsam plus zaun zata! Mhonnun, sambhav aslear chukavnni korun vochonk yevje. Mhozo aja selalu mhontalo, "Ek settlement, kithich ek vaitt settlement-ui, ek lamb zhogdheak porim bore zaunk xakta."
